about.details:
Incorporated in September 2022, Sai Swami Metals and Alloys Ltd. trades in a wide range of stainless steel products to cater to the varied needs of our customers.

The company's product line includes a variety of kitchenware such as Dinner Sets, S.S. Casseroles, S.S. Multi Kadai, S.S. Water Bottles, Stainless Steel Sheets, Stainless Steel Circles, and various utensils.

The Dolphin brand is recognized for trading and marketing stainless steel kitchenware products by the company and its two subsidiaries, Bhagat Marketing Private Limited and Dhruvish Metals LLP.

As of December 31st, 2023, the company has a network of 6 Distributors and more than 150 sub-dealers/stockiest/retailers and strategic alliances in the state of Gujarat, Madhya Pradesh, Maharashtra etc.

On March 31st, 2024, the Company had a total of seven employees.

faqs.question: What is the Sai Swami Metals and Alloys IPO?
faqs.answer:
Sai Swami Metals and Alloys IPO is a SME IPO of 2500000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹15.00 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹60 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on April 30, 2024, and closes on May 3, 2024.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Sai Swami Metals and Alloys IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Sai Swami Metals and Alloys IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Sai Swami Metals and Alloys IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Sai Swami Metals and Alloys IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Sai Swami Metals and Alloys IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Sai Swami Metals and Alloys IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Sai Swami Metals and Alloys IPO opens on April 30, 2024 and closes on May 3, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Sai Swami Metals and Alloys IPO?
faqs.answer: Sai Swami Metals and Alloys IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Sai Swami Metals and Alloys IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Sai Swami Metals and Alloys IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Sai Swami Metals and Alloys IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Sai Swami Metals and Alloys IPO will be done on Monday, May 6, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, May 7, 2024. Check the Sai Swami Metals and Alloys IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Sai Swami Metals and Alloys IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Sai Swami Metals and Alloys IPO listing date is on Wednesday, May 8, 2024.
